messages.subject: Ebay movie alert!
messages.msgSnippet: Thought I d pass this along in case anyone is interested and has a couple extra bucks in their pocket. there are 6 copies of When the Last Sword is
messages.messageBody:
Thought I'd pass this along in case anyone is interested and has a
couple extra bucks in their pocket. there are 6 copies of When the Last
Sword is Drawn/Mibugishiden for sale on ebay for $12.99 + 5 shipping

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=617&item=6300686021

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
